name: 王伯雅
objective: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
schedule:
Week 1 	Orientation 
Week 2 	Complete Listening practice
Week 3 	Listening training /Vocabulary
Week 4 	Listening training /Vocabulary
Week 5 	Day off
Week 6 	Complete Reading practice
Week 7 	Reading training/Vocabulary
Week 8 	Reading training/Vocabulary
Week 9 	Mock Test1
Week 10 	Grammar
Week 11 	Grammar
Week 12 	Mock Test2
Week 13 	Discussion
Week 14 	Listening training /Vocabulary
Week 15 	Reading training/Vocabulary
Week 16 	Mock Test3
Week 17 	0101
Week 18 	Final Week
scorePolicy:
Mock Test1 20%
Mock Test2 20%
Mock Test3 20%
Tests 20%
Attendance and assignment 20%
